name: Back to the father
description:
It is Father’s Day 2025.

An asteroid is heading towards earth and is expected to hit in 2 days!

Jake’s dad is a leading scientist and has almost finished making a laser defence system that will stop the asteroid from destroying the planet.

Jake is trying to make his dad a cup of tea whilst he works in his lab, but something goes wrong.

He tries to turn the kettle on but instead turns on an unstable time machine! The room flashes with light and swirls around! Jake hits his head in the chaos and falls unconscious. When he wakes up the room is a mess and covered in debris. Even worse, the laser defence system has been damaged and it’s parts have been scattered in both the past and present!!!

Using the time machine, you must help Jake to collect the parts missing from both time frames. Watch out, if you don’t fix the machine before the timer runs out then you will be too late and the asteroid will hit!
